what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal A2TEA.WebApp allow exploration, highlighting, exporting results generated A2TEA pipeline run. core package Shiny application aims combine phylogenetic, transcriptomic & functional data results, way makes easier generate insightful observations. A2TEA pipeline requires user formulate hypotheses - specific results produced - WebApp allows investigate genomic adaptations one subset investigated species analyzed treatment condition. A2TEA.WebApp aims combine benefits interactivity reproducibility, e.g. capturing genes orthologous groups interest bookmarked user allowing easy export plots, tables complete subsets original input data.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version A2TEA.WebApp GitHub either remotes devtools, e.g.: Note system dependencies might installed: can also circumvent dependency issues downloading latest release A2TEA Docker image. circumvent potential problems regarding access rights use Singularity pull use image. Note however, require --writable enabled therefore likely require either --fakeroot ---home flag well. command works depend Singularity installation - whether priviliged . sudo rights installed Singularity via systems package manager problem .
code: library(remotes) remotes::install_github("tgstoecker/A2TEA.WebApp", dependencies = TRUE, build_vignettes = TRUE) apt-get update apt-get upgrade apt-get install -y \     libxml2-dev \     libcairo2-dev \     libgit2-dev \     default-libmysqlclient-dev \     libpq-dev \     libsasl2-dev \     libsqlite3-dev \     libssh2-1-dev \     libxtst6 \     libcurl4-openssl-dev \     unixodbc-dev \     libproj-dev xdg-utils \     --fix-missing #pull the image from dockerhub singularity pull a2tea_webapp.sif docker://tgstoecker/a2tea_webapp:latest  #open R console of image in non-persistent but writable mode singularity run --writable --fakeroot a2tea_webapp.sif R #or singularity run --writable --no-home a2tea_webapp.sif R
